Package com.pandora.general.objects.services.abstractions.interfaces

Interface CrudService<T,ID>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity managed by the service.
ID - The type of identifier for the entities.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBaseMapCrudService, AbstractMapCrudService, CellMapCrudService, CellTimestepMapCrudService, RiverMapCrudService, RiverTimestepMapCrudService
public interface CrudService<T,ID>
The CrudService interface defines generic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for managing entities of type T with identifiers of type ID. Implementations of this interface are expected to provide functionality for retrieving, saving, and deleting entities.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

      Retrieves all entities managed by the service.
      Returns:

    • findById

      T findById(ID id)
      Retrieves an entity by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of the entity to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The entity with the specified identifier, or null if not found.
